com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.annotation

Annotation Type SecuredClient

  • Deprecated. 
    Use Authenticated instead

    @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Deprecated
 @AuthenticationOpinion
public @interface SecuredClient
    Any methods on a Controller that have a RequestMapping and this annotation will have the unauthorized requests redirected to the OAuth2 login page. If you want pure token-based authentication, with no manual login support, use Secured
    Author:
    Josh Ghiloni
